title: Prof. Alexander Golberg
text: Welcome to my website; I’m thrilled to share my journey, expertise, and insights with you.

title: Prof. Alexander Golberg
text: Welcome to my website; I’m thrilled to share my journey, expertise, and insights with you.

title: Prof. Alexander Golberg
text:
In few words
I have a genuine passion for writing and :) bio-process engineering, an extraordinary field that offers innovative solutions to make a meaningful impact on the world’s most pressing issues in the realms of health, food, energy, and the environment.
This expertise allows forming new and exciting collaborations, through which we further push the boundaries of known and unknown.

title: Prof. Alexander Golberg
text:
Current position
Chair of the Multidisciplinary Department of Environmental Studies at Tel Aviv University, an exciting academic enterprise that aims to generate and disseminate knowledge of sustainable living and development

title: Prof. Alexander Golberg
text:
Education
Ph.D Bioengineering | The Hebrew University of Jerusalem | 2011
B.Sc Food and Biotechnology Engineering | Technion- Israel Institute of Technology | 2007
